definition: subtotal
small/tiny/few/young
surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Show items, all costs and the subtotal.
sentences.chinese: 查看項目，所有費用和小計。

sentences.english: They feared that smaller and less risky projects would get elbowed out of the budget.
sentences.chinese: 他們擔心一些比較不冒險的小計畫會遭到排擠。

sentences.english: Sub-total , tax and total amount are computed from the line items automatically.
sentences.chinese: 小計，稅收和總金額計算從項目自動。
